articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet to Welcome Jagang Provincial Innovators
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet to Welcome Jagang Provincial Innovators

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Friday to welcome officials, labor innovators, scientists and technicians from the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant.
					
					 Those officials, workers, scientists and technicians of the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant put the nation's machine-building industry on the up-to-date level and achieved signal success in realizing the robotization. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Yong Chun and other senior officials, officials concerned, officials of party and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, noted in his speech that General Secretary Kim Jong Il praised the officials, labor innovators, scientists and technicians of the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant for having realized the modernization and scientification of production processes at a high level. The leader invited them to Pyongyang and provided this grand mass meeting to welcome them, he added.
					
					 Those innovators set an example in every aspect including development and production of new products, economic management and improvement of production environment by fully displaying the Kanggye spirit, thus further glorifying the undying leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and strikingly proving again that science and technology guarantee a thriving nation, he said.
					
					 The speaker called upon all the people to register world-startling achievements much more and faster on all fronts of the advance for great surge with the indomitable mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation, the do-or-die spirit and the same creative spirit as was displayed by the Huichon workers under the WPK's Songun leadership.
					
					 The floor of the meeting was taken by Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, and Jo Jae Yong, manager of the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant.
					
					 They said that the stirring news from Jagang Province, which made a breakthrough in the machine-building industry, gives great courage to the Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 They said that the working spirit of the Huichon innovators serve as a model to be followed by everybody in the on-going general offensive.
					
					 The brilliant reality today is a valuable fruition of the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il who is taking the lead in the unaccustomed drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology, they stressed.

articles.title: Jagang Provincial Innovators Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Jagang Provincial Innovators Visit Mangyongdae

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Officials, labor innovators, scientists and technicians from the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of Kim Il Sung, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and paid a silent tribute to them.
					
					 At the old home of the President the visitors were briefed on his noble revolutionary life and on the patriotic and revolutionary Mangyongdae family.
					
					 On the same day they visited the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm and other factories built in the farm area on a modern line.
					
					 After being briefed on the fact that the farm has turned into a big fruit production base under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the visitors commanded a bird's-eye view of farm fields with fruit trees standing in rows, orderly roads and modern dwelling houses.
					
					 They also toured the Taedonggang Pig Farm, Taedonggang Terrapin Farm, Taedonggang Net-weaving Factory and the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Processing Factory.

articles.title: Italian Delegation Goes back Home
articles.content:
Italian Delegation Goes back Home

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Italian delegation of assemblymen from different political parties led by Mauro Del Vecchio, senator from the Democratic Party, went back home by air on Friday.

articles.title: Mt. Kumgang Tourist Group Arrives
articles.content:
Harbin-Mt. Kumgang Tourist Group Arrives

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A trial Harbin-Mt. Kumgang tourist group arrived in Pyongyang by a chartered flight on Friday. 
					
					 The group was headed by Chen Xibin, a member of the Standing Committee of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Congress of China. 
					
					 The tourists were greeted at the airport by Ri Chung Bok, deputy director of the DPRK Guidance Bureau of the Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Abnormal Weather Observed in Korea
articles.content:
Abnormal Weather Observed in Korea

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Abnormal climatic conditions have been observed in Korea in autumn.
					
					 Sim Myong Ok, a vice-director of the Central Meteorological Research Institute, told KCNA that the subtropical frontal zone has moved up to 35 degrees north latitude from the beginning of November to raise temperature and cause a large amount of precipitation.
					
					 Such phenomenon is the first of its kind in the country since Juche 54 (1965), she said, adding:
					
					 A warm temperature, higher than the average, has persisted in all parts of Korea these days. 
					
					 It is because the middle latitudes have been severely affected by high pressure. So, warm and damp air formed by the subtropical frontal zone has moved towards Korea from late October.
					
					 With low pressure formed in the subtropical front passing above the area south of the central part of Korea, many areas of Korea, including Pyongyang, North and South Phyongan, North and South Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces, are likely to have a large amount of precipitation on Friday and Saturday.
					
					 According to data available until Friday morning, it rained more than 50mm in Nampho City, Kangwon Province and some other areas.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Gwon, Indomitable Revolutionary
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Gwon, Indomitable Revolutionary

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- November 4 marks the 106th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Gwon, who was an indomitable revolutionary fighter and uncle of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He remained loyal to the President until the end of his life, respecting him as the leader of the Korean revolution.
					
					 As a hardcore member of the Baishan Youth League, the Young Communist League of Korea and the Society for Rallying Comrades, the first party organization, which were organized by the President, Kim Hyong Gwon faithfully upheld his revolutionary cause.
					
					 His unyielding revolutionary faith and strong mental power were highly displayed in implementing the policy of armed struggle advanced by the President.
					
					 He conducted bold military activities in local areas to expand the armed struggle deep into the homeland.
					
					 In August Juche 19 (1930), he led an armed group of the Korean Revolutionary Army to pass through Samsu and Phungso areas in the northern part of Korea, attack a police station at noon in Phabal-ri, Phungsan County and punish the Japanese head of the station for his harsh repression of local people.
					
					 Arrested by the Japanese police, he did not abandon the faith and principle of a revolutionary.
					
					 The unyielding spirit he displayed in prison serves as an example to be followed by the Korean servicepersons and civilians.

articles.title: Socialism Advances Full of Vigor and Energy
articles.content:
Socialism Advances Full of Vigor and Energy

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il in his famous work "Socialism Is a Science" proved the truth and invincibility of socialism in an all-round way, saying that it is as alive as ever in the minds of the people.
					
					 He affirmed that socialism, the ideal and revolutionary banner of the popular masses struggling for independence, is sure to be revived and win in the end.
					
					 The scientific accuracy of his strong affirmation has been proved in practice.
					
					 Socialism is greeting a new heyday after dealing a heavy blow to capitalism.
					
					 More than 270 political parties are struggling to defend and advance the socialist cause under the banner of the Pyongyang Declaration.
					
					 It has become the irreversible main trend of the times to reject capitalism and aspire after socialism.
					
					 Social conversion from capitalism to socialism is taking place in Latin America which suffered much more damage by American-style "globalization" than other regions.
					
					 Absolute superiority of socialism over capitalism has been clearly proved in the revolutionary practice to overturn the old and create the new.
					
					 Socialists, working class, oppressed people and nations in different countries are holding aloft the banner of socialism, breaking the chain of capitalism.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the trust of the world people in socialism is growing deeper.
					
					 Socialism has gained rich experience and lesson in the course of overcoming painful setback and ordeals and is advancing full of vigor and energy with the broader and firmer class foundation.
					
					 All the forces are aspiring after socialism, the forces protecting peace against war of aggression and advocating democracy, freedom, equality and justice and the forces loving the country and defending the people's right and interests.
					
					 The present era is that of a historical turn in which capitalism is itching close to the end and the world people are dynamically advancing along the road of independence and socialism.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, man-centered socialism, is the most scientific, advantageous and powerful one.
					
					 The history of modern Korea is that of victorious socialism in which the nation's dignity and sovereignty have been reliably defended in the do-or-die showdown with capitalism.
					
					 It is the miracle of history that the DPRK, which is standing in showdown with the U.S. imperialists in the crucible of acute confrontation between socialism and capitalism, could push forward socialist construction and bring about a turning phase of the grand advance for prosperity.
					
					 Peoples of many countries are struggling to revive the socialist movement with the firm resolve to take the road of socialism while looking up to the DPRK as the beacon of hope. This fact goes to prove it is right and proud that the DPRK carved out and has defended Korean-style socialism according to its faith and resolution no matter how and what others do. Anyone with discretion recognizes that the road chosen by the DPRK is right.
					
					 In the DPRK all the people are closely united as one on the basis of the revolutionary obligation and comradeship and help and lead each other forward on the principle of one for all and all for one.
					
					 This picture is unthinkable in capitalist society, and it is the highest pride of our society and the source of the Korean people's great happiness and invincible strength.

articles.title: Punishment of Anti-DPRK Maniacs Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Anti-DPRK Maniacs Called for in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The "Path of the Nation," organ of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, Wednesday issued an article titled "Anti-reunification maniacs keen on confrontation with the DPRK are bound to pay dear price".
					
					 The harsh suppression is going on under the pretext of the "incident of the Iljin Association", anti-DPRK and anti-reunification confrontational farce, the article said, pointing out that the Intelligence Service (IS) cooked up the incident by invoking the notorious "National Security Law".
					
					 The suppression is targeted against those who have conducted the work for the south-north exchange and cooperation including the pro-reunification activists and personages of opposition parties, the article held.
					
					 IS has so far kicked up the racket for cooking up spyring case. As a result, 70 odd innocent people have been suppressed, it deplored.
					
					 Moreover, IS is making desperate efforts to link the case with the above-said organization, it said, stating that with no fascist tyranny can deter the organization from conducting reunification movement.
					
					 It urged the "government" and IS not to fabricate such a case any more but stop at once the crackdown upon the pro-reunification activists.

articles.title: Russia-DPRK Relations Will Further Develop: Russians
articles.content:
Russia-DPRK Relations Will Further Develop: Russians

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations and personages made public statements between Oct. 26 and 28 to express belief that the Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations will further develop in all fields.
					
					 The Association for the Study of the DPRK of Asia-Africa College under Moscow State University in its statement expressed full support for the fundamental principles clarified in the answers General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave to questions by ITAR-TASS of Russia.
					
					 The Russian people, together with the Korean people, will make every possible effort to establish a fair international order in Asia and the rest of the world, it said.
					
					 The Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association, Karelia Branch of the Russian Veterans Fund, Karelia Branch of the Movement for Supporting the Army, Karelia Branch of the Navy Veterans' Union and the Karelia Branch of the International Union of Soviet Officers said in their joint statement that in his answers Kim Jong Il made clear on a wide scale the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, the resumption of the six-party talks and the prospect of normalizing the DPRK's relations with the U.S. and Japan.
					
					ã€€The general director of a company said in a statement that the answers made him know well about Kim Jong Il's will and the desire of the Korean people. I express heartfelt thanks to him for the efforts made for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries, the general director added.

articles.title: Italian Party Hails DPRK Stand on Denuclearization
articles.content:
Italian Party Hails DPRK Stand on Denuclearization

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy made public a statement on Oct. 30 as regards the answers General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave to questions put by ITAR-TASS of Russia.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Regarding the DPRK government's stand on the DPRK-Russia relations, peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and the world and the denuclearization of the peninsula, in particular, clarified by supreme leader Kim Jong Il in the answers, as the most fair and aboveboard one, the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy expresses full support for it.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should stop at once the anti-DPRK war moves aggravating the situation of the Korean Peninsula, resume the six-party talks without precondition and implement the Sept. 19 joint statement on the principle of simultaneous actions, thus responding to the call of the DPRK government for denuclearization of the peninsula as soon as possible.
					
					 Convinced that the Korean people will surely build a prosperous and powerful socialist country, rallied closer around Kim Jong Il, we extend firm solidarity to them in their efforts to defend and advance socialism.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Favored by Italian Party Leader
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Favored by Italian Party Leader

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Italy will in the future, too, extend support and solidarity to the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people.
					
					 General Secretary of the Communist Party of Italy Oliviero Diliverto stressed this stand on Oct. 28 when meeting with DPRK Ambassador to Italy Han Tae Song who attended the Sixth Congress of his Party as the delegate of the WPK.
					
					 The leadership ability of the WPK has grown stronger with its Conference held last year as a momentum, he noted.
					
					 The WPK is now registering successes in socialist economic construction while taking steps for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, he said, adding this powerfully encourages the Communist Party of Italy and other progressive political parties of the world.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would bring about a great turn in socialist construction on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Marked in Italy and Uganda
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Marked in Italy and Uganda

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a photo exhibition took place in Italy and a seminar in Uganda on Oct. 27 and 28 to mark the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 85th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU). 
					
					 On display in the photo exhibition hall were works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos showing the Korean people in the efforts for socialist construction and national reunification. 
					
					 The secretary of a district, Rome, committee of the Communist Reconstruction Party of Italy noted at a seminar that General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integrated system of idea, theory and method of Juche and proclaimed the program of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea. He has consistently embodied the line of attaching importance to ideology, the secretary said, adding:
					
					 The root of the Workers' Party of Korea was already set when the President formed the DIU to usher in the building of a revolutionary party. 
					
					 The Korean people will continue to vigorously advance along the road of socialism chosen by them under the banner of Juche and always emerge victorious. 
					
					Justin Keyune, chief of the Group for the Study of Songun Politics of Kampala Coloro Higher Middle School of Uganda, and other speakers stressed that the Juche idea, enriched and developed by Kim Jong Il, is the great idea to be followed by the world progressives.

articles.title: State Council Meeting Held in China
articles.content:
State Council Meeting Held in China

					 Beijing, November 3 (KCNA) -- The State Council of China had an executive meeting on October 29, presided over by Premier Wen Jiabao.  
					
					 Discussed at the meeting were such issues as stabilizing prices, taking measures for harvesting and agricultural production in autumn and winter, improving the people's living and ensuring labor safety.

articles.title: China Succeeds in Making Shenzhou-8 Dock with Tiangong-1
articles.content:
China Succeeds in Making Shenzhou-8 Dock with Tiangong-1

					 Beijing, November 3 (KCNA) -- Unmanned spacecraft Shenzhou-8 docked with space lab module Tiangong-1 early Thursday in China, flying the space.
					
					 Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, sent a congratulatory message over the first successful docking of spacecraft that day.
					
					 The message hoped that all the participants in researches and test would make redoubled efforts and achieve unity and cooperation by giving full play to the manned aerospace spirit and thus make bigger contributions to opening up a new phase of manned aerospace work of China.

articles.title: EU Urged to Take Positive Measures for Debt Problem
articles.content:
EU Urged to Take Positive Measures for Debt Problem

					 Beijing, November 3 (KCNA) -- China hopes that the European Union will take positive measures to solve the debt problem, a Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman said on Wednesday. 
					
					 Speaking to reporters, Hong Lei said China will join the international community in the effort for overcoming the present economic difficulties and promoting the recovery and growth of the global economy.

articles.title: China to Further Develop Relations with Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
China to Further Develop Relations with Kyrgyzstan

					 Beijing, November 3 (KCNA) -- A Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Wednesday expressed the country's stand to further develop the relationship with Kyrgyzstan.
					
					 Referring to a presidential election held successfully in Kyrgyzstan some time ago, Hong Lei told a press conference that China will steadily consolidate the traditional friendship and strengthen reciprocal cooperation with Kyrgyzstan in several fields.
					
					 China will promote a continuous development of the good-neighborly and cooperative relations with Kyrgyzstan through bilateral coordination within multilateral framework like the United Nations and the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, he added.

articles.title: Russian Air Force Conducts Patrol Flight in Sky above Pacific Waters
articles.content:
Russian Air Force Conducts Patrol Flight in Sky above Pacific Waters

					Moscow, November 3 (KCNA) -- Two Ty-95MCs, strategic bombers of the Air Force of Russia, conducted patrol flight in the sky above the Pacific waters.
					
					The bombers which took off from the Ukrainka Air Base successfully carried out their duty pursuant to the flight plan, a spokesman for the Air Force of Russia said on Wednesday.

articles.title: Russia Strongly Rejects US Accusations over Human Rights
articles.content:
Russia Strongly Rejects US Accusations over Human Rights

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The United States has recently got overheated in an anti-Russia human rights campaign, fanning up the feud and antagonism between the two countries. 
					
					 In November 2009 a lawyer, who was arrested on charges of illicit fortune, suddenly died of illness while getting a preliminary interrogation in Russia. He was engaged in an international financial company. 
					
					 It is reported that this case is now under investigation in Russia and so the court has not yet made a judgment on him.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S., styling itself as a "human rights judge", made an issue of the case to slander Russia over "human rights situation". It is advertising that in Russia prisoners would die under preliminary interrogation without being tried and judged.
					
					 Other Western countries follow the suit of the U.S. to flail Russia.
					
					 The government of Russia rebutted the accusations by the U.S. and other western countries, claiming that such action, aimed to give pressure on state institutions of Russia, is an organized political provocation which has nothing to do with respect for human rights or probe into the case.
					
					 Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov rejected the U.S. State Department's examination of a resolution on imposing sanctions on official figures of Russia as interference in its internal affairs.
					
					 The Russian Foreign Ministry said that Russia would not allow any attempt to meddle in investigation by judicial organs and give pressure on relevant organs, but take prompt counteraction if the U.S. applies sanctions. 
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the State Duma of Russia accused the U.S. of sowing discord in the Russia-U.S. relations by means of such illegitimate method with a view to bringing the relations to the line of the Cold War or making them go beyond it.
					
					 The Russian Foreign Ministry in a statement on Oct. 22 said that a list of U.S. citizens Russia confirmed as persona non grata on the principle of reciprocity was ratified.
					
					If the U.S. opts for visa confrontation, Russia has no other choice but to extend the list, it added.

articles.title: More Gun-related Crimes Occur in US
articles.content:
More Gun-related Crimes Occur in US

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Gun-related crimes occurred one after another in New Orealans in the U.S. state of Louisianna on Tuesday, stirring up great uneasiness and horror among inhabitants.
					
					 Two people were killed and 13 others injured in four separate shootings.

articles.title: Economic Depression in Japan
articles.content:
Economic Depression in Japan

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Japan's housing starts in September fell 10.8 percent from a year earlier, the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism said Monday.
					
					 Renesas Electronics Corp. on Monday reported a consolidated net loss of 42.01 billion yen for the April-September period.

articles.title: More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers in Afghanistan met deaths due to the attacks of the resistance forces of the country.
					
					 Two soldiers with the NATO-led International Security Assistance Force (ISAF) lost their lives as an Improvised Explosive Device went off in eastern Afghanistan on Tuesday.
					
					 More than 500 NATO-led soldiers with majority of them Americans have been killed so far this year in Afghanistan.

articles.title: Iran Demands Apology from US for Alleged Plot to Kill Saudi Envoy
articles.content:
Iran Demands Apology from US for Alleged Plot to Kill Saudi Envoy

					 Tehran, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Iranian government recently sent a diplomatic note to the U.S. government in denunciation of the U.S. moves to label Iran a terrorist sponsor.
					
					 The U.S. allegation over assassination attempt against Saudi ambassador to the U.S. is based on lies, the note said.
					
					 It sought unspecified compensation for material and moral damages of this baseless accusation.

articles.title: Iranian FM Spokesman Rejects Clinton's Remarks on Virtual Embassy
articles.content:
Iranian FM Spokesman Rejects Clinton's Remarks on Virtual Embassy

					 Tehran, November 3 (KCNA) -- Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman Ramin Mehmanparast rejected on Monday the U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton's announcement that the U.S. was willing to set up a virtual embassy for Iranians.
					
					It seems such unprofessional remarks clearly depict contraction between deeds and words of U.S. officials, he said.
					
					Setting up a virtual embassy is meaningless, he noted.

articles.title: PNA Warns Israel against Military Action
articles.content:
PNA Warns Israel against Military Action

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A Palestinian official warned on Tuesday of a large-scale Israeli military operation in the Gaza Strip and the West Bank.
					
					 The official added that the PNA got information about a possible Israeli military operation,
					
					 The possibility of a military operation was boosted after the UNESCO admitted the PNA as a full member, he said.
					
					 The PNA is making intensive contacts with the international community to prevent any Israeli measure, he noted.

articles.title: Iran, Brazil Support Palestinian UNESCO Membership
articles.content:
Iran, Brazil Support Palestinian UNESCO Membership

					Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of Iran in a press conference Tuesday commended the decision by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) to grant the Palestinians a full membership as a sign of international support for the rights of Palestinians.
					
					 He called on the United States to be realistic on the Palestinian issue and not to stand against the "world opinion." 
					
					 The Brazilian government congratulated Palestine on its admission as a full member of UNESCO, said a communique released by the Foreign Ministry on Monday.

articles.title: Israeli Army Arrests 12 Palestinians
articles.content:
Israeli Army Arrests 12 Palestinians

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Israeli army is persistent in cracking down on Palestinians despite the protest and denunciation by the international community.
					
					 It arrested 12 Palestinians during overnight raids in several parts of the West Bank on Monday.

articles.title: Flood Damage Increases in Ghana
articles.content:
Flood Damage Increases in Ghana

					 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- At least 14 people including eight males and six females died in the flush floods following the torrential rains that hit the Ghanaian capital city Acrra last week.
					
					 The floods also displaced 43,000 people in the suburbs and around Accra.
					
					 The government is taking relief steps for the victims and working hard to prevent the possible damage.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona la Unidad 322 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona la Unidad 322 del EPC

					Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Unidad 322 del EPC que obtuvo el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC Kim Jong Un, el submariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional Jang Song Thaek, el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Ok y los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong, Pak Jae Gyong y Hyon Chol Hae.
					
					Tras recibir el saludo de la guardia de honor, el Dirigente recorrio los equipos tecnicos de combate dando conocimiento de los ejercicios y el estado de preparacion para el combate de la unidad.
					
					El Comandante Supremo evaluo que los oficiales de la unidad estan perfeccionando los preparativos de combate de su propia rama conforme a la moderna ciencia y tecnica militares y el modo de accion de combate.
					
					Al senalar que cuando esta totalmente listo al combate, puede frustrar de un golpe al ataque inesperado de los enemigos, agrego que la unidad siempre debe pensar, meditar y poner en practica los preparativos del combate.
					
					Se refirio a que la patria socialista es inexpugnable gracias a los fidedignos militares como los de la unidad bien preparados para cumplir inmediata e incondicionalmente la orden de combate dada por el Partido y la patria.
					
					El mismo dia, el se reunio con los Heroes de la Republica quienes cumplieron satisfactoriamente el asumido deber de ejercicios y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Luego, el Comandante Supremo recorrio una subunidad adscrita a la mencionada unidad.
					
					Al mirar los caquis rojos en los alrededores del cuartel, dijo que los arboles dieron muchos frutos, evaluo con satisfaccion los esfuerzos de los uniformados y la denomino como subunidad Kamnamu (caqui).
					
					Dio vuelta a la sala de educacion donde hizo conocimiento del estado de labor de educacion ideo-politica que se realizaba entre los militares. Ante las fotos de los heroes de la subunidad glorifico aun mas sus proezas y ante la tabla de aviso de honor vio las fotos de los militares ejemplares en los ejercicios militares y politicos.
					
					En el almacen diario de alimentos, se mostro satisfecho de que se ofrece a los militares una rica vida alimentaria.
					
					El Comandante Supremo volvio a evaluar que los militares de la unidad mantienen la aguda vigilancia ante las maniobras de agresion de los enemigos y dan acicate a los ejercicios sin aflojar la tension combativa.
					
					El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los militares de la unidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Maquinaria de Thaesong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Maquinaria de Thaesong

					Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinaria de Thaesong.
					
					Guiado por los funcionarios directivos de la fabrica, el Dirigente recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Paro el paso ante la tabla de proposicion del Presidente Kim Il Sung: la fabrica debe grabar con orgullo el nombre de nuestro pais en los productos mecanicos, y recordo con gran emocion la abnegacion y esfuerzos del Presidente dedicados al desarrollo de la fabrica.
					
					Al ver los datos sobre los condecorados con la Orden Kim Il Sung, los ganadores del Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung, los Heroes del Trabajo y otros innovadores laborales y el Premio de Ciencia y Tecnica 16 de Febrero con que la fabrica fue condecorada, evaluo que hizo gran aporte al desarrollo de la industria de construccion de maquinaria y de la ciencia y tecnica del pais.
					
					En el taller de montaje de maquinaria, se entero en detalles el estado de produccion y de la investigacion cientifica y tecnica.
					
					Viendo con satisfaccion las maquinas recien producidas se mostro muy complacido de que los obreros, los cientificos y los tecnicos de la fabrica hayan producido las maquinas de punta que pueden representar la epoca del Songun poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu extraordinario de creacion.
					
					Viendo una tras otra las piezas de maquinas inventadas dijo que han hecho bien tales accesorios de alta precision tan dificiles de elaborarse 
					
					Al recibir el informe de que gracias a haber aplicado la tecnologia CNC en todo el proceso de produccion, la fabrica hace facilmente cualesquier productos de maquinaria en que no pudiera pensar en el pasado, destaco que ahora con la tecnologia CNC por doquier del pais se logran los exitos orgullosos que asombran al mundo.
					
					El Dirigente hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de la cultura del trabajo y de la vida y de la intendencia y evaluo que segun el legado del Presidente los funcionarios de la fabrica hacen bien la administracion de la fabrica y el servicio de abastecimiento a los obreros.
					
					Senalando que la Fabrica de Maquinaria de Thaesong es la base importante de construccion de maquinas que se pone en la primera linea de la lucha por hacer mas prospero nuestro pais, presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					En la ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por  Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el submariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Ok, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong, Pak Jae Kyong y Hyon Chol Hae.

articles.title: CNCDP condena maniobras de guerra de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP condena maniobras de guerra de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea

					Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) en una declaracion fechada 3 condeno el contubernio y las maniobras de guerra de Estados Unidos y la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					 Durante la reciente visita a EE.UU., el gobernante surcoreano urdio un complot militar en el Departamento de Estado norteamericano.
					
					 Ademas, los 27 y 28 de octubre, los belicistas de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea convocaron en Seul la reunion de la comision militar y la reunion consultiva anual de seguridad, ocasiones en las cuales discutieron la "incorporacion de las tropas norteamericanas en la guerra local" y la "estrategia disuasiva al estilo de ajuste".
					
					  Establecieron el nuevo plan de operacion conjunta para hacer frente a la "provocacion local" de alguien y suplementan y perfeccionan en general los planes de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					  Para ponerlos en practica libran diariamente los ejercicios belicos como "Hoguk" en Phohang de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte, las zonas de la linea de demarcacion militar, la isla Paekryong y otras zonas colindantes con la parte Norte. 
					
					  Ademas, las tropas norteamericanas y el ejercito surcoreano reorganizan y refuerzan el sistema de mando conjunto y aceleran los preparativos de guerra mediante la entrega masiva de los equipos belicos sofisticados EE.UU. al ejercito titere surcoreano. 
					
					  La confabulacion militar y las maniobras de guerra de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana devienen una provocacion muy peligrosa encaminada a destruir la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, acarrear una nueva guerra fria y la carrera armamentista y desencadenar la guerra.
					
					  Es absurdo lo que ellos describen sus maniobras belicas como un movimiento para hacer frente a la "provocacion" de alguien.
					
					  La banda titere es el autor que insulta a la RPDC disparando las balas y proyectiles contra los blancos que ofrenden el sistema y la dignidad de ella, lanzando los volantes de contenido anti-RPDC y  emitiendo la radiodifusion intrigante.
					
					  Los cabecillas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea y de EE.UU. sueltan las palabras provocativas tales como la "operacion aerea por encima de la linea de demarcacion militar" y el "ataque preventivo".
					
					  La confabulacion y el alboroto de guerra de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea demuestran que el "dialogo" y la "paz" de que hablan ellos no pasan de ser una hipocresia y que ellos tienen solo la mala intencion de atacar a la contraparte.
					
					  Con las fuerzas no se puede obtener nada ni sorprender a la RPDC.
					
					  La "provocacion" y la "amenaza" de que hablan ellos son los metodos rutinarios de que se valen los agresores para provocar a la contraparte.
					
					  El ejercito y pueblo coreanos estan listos tanto para la guerra local y como para la total.
					
					  Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC frustraran sin piedad la "estrategia disuasiva al estilo de ajuste" y otros con el poderio del Songun.
					
					  EE.UU. y la banda titere deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de las consecuencias catastroficas que se emanen de la peligrosa confabulacion militar y la campana de guerra.

articles.title: Clausurado 22o concurso-exposicion nacional de programas
articles.content:
Clausurado 22o concurso-exposicion nacional de programas

					Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado la vispera en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones el 22o Concurso-Exposicion Nacional de Programas inaugurado el 27 de octubre.
					
					En la ocasion tuvieron lugar el concurso de programa de traduccion ingles-coreana, el de experimentos de ensayo por computadora, etc. 
					
					Tambien hubo el intercambio de IT y el servicio de programas.
					
					En la exhibicion de computarizacion de la rama de ministerios y organos centrales, el ministerio de Agricultura gano el grado especial; el ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo, el de Salud Publica, el de Industria Ligera, el de Industria Electrica, el Banco de Comercio, el Comite Estatal de Control de la Calidad y la Direccion Nacional de Estadisticas, ocuparon el primer lugar.
					
					En la rama de las fabricas y empresas, la Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang, el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek, la Direccion Central de Informaciones y Comunicaciones, la Fabrica de Confeccion de Ropas de Pyongyang, la Fabrica de Vidrios Amistad de Taean, y la fabrica filial de vasijas de vidrio de Nampho fueron evaluados.
					
					Mas de 200 programas presentados por la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Universidad de Industria de Huichon, el Instituto de Matematica de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y otras unidades salieron victoriosos en la rama de exposicion de programas.
					
					En el concurso de programa de traduccion ingles-coreana, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Universidad de Pesqueria de Wonsan y el Centro de Informatica de Pyongyang lograron primer lugar, y en el concurso de experimentos de ensayo por computadora, la Universidad Kim Il Sung  se adjudico primera.
					
					Participaron en el acto el vicepremier Ro Tu Chol, el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Choe Hui Jong, el presidente de Comite de Educacion Kim Yong Jin y otros funcionarios concernientes junto con los explotadores de programas.
